resources.string:
An Introduction to Virtual Locker Virtual locker createsapplication on your smart phone or tablet from being accessed by others without your knowledge. You can lock any photos, videos, audio and documents you desire using a password of your choice. Virtual Lock allows you to:
 • Upload pictures.
 • Upload videos.
 • Upload documents.
 • Upload audio.
 It is considered a potentially powerful tool to make business environments more secure. On the other hand it’s a tool that can be used by advanced home users as well. The newest “cloud-based” storage system, Virtual Locker provides users withthe ability to access and open files online with anyone-at any time. Simply select file types into Virtual Locker, and you will be able to download and store files, collaborate with others on your documents, and more! All users are provided with unlimited of storage for free. We can secure your data and files.

SVP students will be getting their own account for login on district devices, a virtual locker storage and drop boxes. In order to create your account.

Please note there are a few things to know prior to registering:

1. Your full legal name
 2. Your Email id
 3. A strong password (see below for tips and requirements on creating a strong password)

You can find this information below on the Technology website:

Password must meet the following criteria:
 • Minimum of 8 characters
 • Must contain at least one numeral(0-9)
 • The following special characters can be used as your choice-!@#$*%
 • Must be different from the last 3 passwords used
 Virtual Locker is a secure android -based application that provides access to the files and folders stored in your device from anywhere using an application, such as virtual locker.
